index.heroText: Manage seats with Excel, draw seats with employee codes. All-in-one seat and extension management.
index.feature1Text: Just enter your employee code to fairly draw your daily seat. No more hassle deciding where to sit.
index.feature2Text: Import and export seat master and employee data via Excel. Use your existing data as-is.
index.feature3Text: Check seat status in real-time. See who is sitting where at a glance.
index.feature4Text: Link seats with extension numbers. No confusion when transferring calls.
index.feature5Text: Release your seat when going out to maximize seat utilization. Share presence status in real-time.
index.feature6Text: Easily manage seat master, members, and settings from the admin page.
index.step1Text: Register your company and employee information to get started. Import from existing Excel data is available.
index.step2Text: Administrators register office seat information including seat numbers and extension numbers.
index.step3Text: Employees enter their employee code when arriving to draw their seat. Today's seat is automatically assigned.
index.step4Text: Check the seat map and seating status anytime. Easily find where your colleagues are sitting.
index.footerDescription: Simple hot desking seat management for your office.

howto.menuText: Access the URL to see the menu screen. From here you can access all features.
howto.menuTip: The orange "Draw Hot Desking Seat" button in the center is the most frequently used feature.
howto.lotteryText: Draw your daily seat by lottery. Do this when you arrive at work.
howto.lotteryStep1Title: Tap "Draw Hot Desking Seat" from menu
howto.lotteryStep2Text: Enter your employee number using the keypad.
howto.lotteryStep3Text: After entering your employee number, press the "Next" button.
howto.lotteryStep4Text: Your seat for today will be displayed.
howto.lotteryTip: If you make a mistake, use "Clear" to erase all or "BS" to delete one character.
howto.lotteryWarning: You can only draw once per day. Please note that once drawn, your seat cannot be changed.
howto.seatMapText: Check the office seat layout. See who is sitting where at a glance.
howto.seatMapStep2Text: The office layout will be displayed.
howto.seatMapHowToRead: How to Read the Seat Map
howto.seatMapHowToRead1: Seat numbers (A01, B02, etc.) are shown on each seat
howto.seatMapHowToRead2: Occupied seats show the person's name
howto.seatMapHowToRead3: Empty seats show only the seat number
howto.seatMapHowToRead4: Fixed seats (manager, president, etc.) are shown separately
howto.seatMapTip: The seat map updates in real-time after lottery.
howto.checkText: Check who is sitting where in list format.
howto.checkStep2Text: You can sort by seat order or name order.
howto.checkHowToRead1: Seat Order: Displayed by seat number (left side)
howto.checkHowToRead2: Name Order: Displayed by employee name (right side)
howto.checkHowToRead3: Previous/Next Day: Switch dates to check
howto.checkTip: "Name Order" is convenient when looking for a specific person.
howto.awayText: When leaving for meetings or going out for a long time, release your seat so others can use it.
howto.awayStep2Text: Enter your employee number using the keypad.
howto.awayStep3Text: Your seat will be released and your name will disappear from the seat map.
howto.awayWarning: Registering away will invalidate your seat for the day. You cannot redraw, so please confirm before releasing your seat.
howto.searchText: Search for employee seats and extension numbers. Useful when transferring calls.
howto.searchStep2Text: Search by name or employee number to check seat and extension number.
howto.searchTip: Use this feature to check extension numbers of people you frequently contact.
howto.faq1Q: Q. What if I want to redraw?
howto.faq1A: Sorry, but you can only draw once per day and cannot redraw. If you really need to change seats, please consult with the administrator.
howto.faq2Q: Q. My name is not shown on the seat map
howto.faq2A: The lottery may not be completed. If you haven't drawn yet, please draw from "Draw Hot Desking Seat". If you have already drawn, please contact the administrator.
howto.faq3Q: Q. I forgot my employee number
howto.faq4Q: Q. I want to sit in a specific seat
howto.faq4A: Due to the hot desking system, seats are determined by lottery. However, if the administrator has set fixed seats, that seat will be assigned.

lottery.title: Hot Desking Lottery
lottery.alreadyLeft: You have already left for today
lottery.fullSeats: , all seats are full today. Please use the meeting area

Please keep this ID safe.
It is required to access the Hot Desking system.
regist.errorEmailExists: This email address is already in use
regist.errorRetry: Please check your input and try again.

upload.title: Master Upload
upload.subtitle: Upload seat master data
upload.warning: Uploading will overwrite the current master data. We recommend backing up beforehand.

password.title: Change Password
password.subtitle: Set a new password
password.confirmHint: Please enter the same password again for confirmation

mailChange.subtitle: Set a new email address
mailChange.confirmHint: Please enter the same email address again for confirmation
mailChange.success: Email address has been changed to "

companyChange.title: Change Company Name
companyChange.subtitle: Change the displayed company name
companyChange.hint: This company name will be displayed on the Hot Desking screen
companyChange.success: Company name has been changed to "

owasure.title: Forgot Your Password?
owasure.info: Press the button below to send your password to the registered email address.
owasure.success: Password has been sent by email
owasure.resultInfo:
Password has been sent to the registered email address.
Please check your email.

setup.pageIntro: Learn how to register and set up HotDesking
setup.part2Subtitle: Set up seats and employee information
setup.registStep1Text: Click "Register" or "Get Started Free" button on the top page.
setup.registStep3Text: After entering all information, click the blue "Register" button.
setup.registStep4Text: Upon completion, your ID will be issued.
setup.registStep4Important: Please keep this ID safe. It is required to access the Hot Desking system.
setup.registStep5Text: Clicking the button will take you to the menu screen.
setup.registStep5Text2: User registration is now complete. Let's proceed with the initial setup.
setup.adminLoginStep1Text: Click the olive-colored "Admin Page" button at the top of the menu screen.
setup.adminLoginStep1Caption: Menu Screen (Admin Page button at top)
setup.adminLoginStep2Text: Enter the password you set during registration and click "Login".
setup.adminLoginStep3Text: After login, the admin menu will be displayed.
setup.adminLoginTip: The links in the "URLs" section are for sharing with employees.
setup.downloadStep1Text: Click the "Download Sample Master" button in the admin menu.
setup.downloadStep2Text: A file named sample-seat.xlsx will be downloaded.
setup.downloadTip: Edit this sample file to set up your company's seat and employee information.
setup.excelIntro: The downloaded sample-seat.xlsx has 3 sheets. Please edit each one.
setup.sheet1Desc: Set up office seat layout. You can freely place seat numbers (3-character alphanumeric) in Excel cells.
setup.sheet1Caption: view sheet - Example of seat layout setup
setup.sheet1Row2Col2: Cell position becomes seat map position
setup.sheet1Tip: Seat colors and objects (plants, lockers, etc.) can also be set freely in Excel.
setup.sheet2Desc: Set detailed information and fixed seats for each seat.
setup.sheet2Warning: For fixed seats (manager, president, etc.), enter the employee code in mid. Empty seats become hot desking targets.
setup.sheet3Tip: The employee code (mid) is the number employees enter during lottery. Set easy-to-remember numbers.
setup.excelImportant: After editing, save the file. You can change the filename if you want.
setup.uploadStep1Text: Click the orange "Master Upload" button in the admin menu.
setup.uploadStep2Text: Click "Select File" and choose the edited Excel file.
setup.uploadStep2Warning: Uploading will overwrite current master data. We recommend backing up beforehand.
setup.uploadStep3Text: After selecting the file, click the "Upload" button.
setup.uploadStep4Text: When upload is complete, a list of registered seats and employees will be displayed.
setup.uploadTip: Errors will be displayed here if any. Check the content and modify Excel if necessary.
setup.confirmStep1Text: Click the "General Hot Desking Screen" link in admin menu or use browser back button.
setup.confirmStep2Text: Click "View Seat Map" to confirm that the configured seat layout is reflected.
setup.confirmTip: If the seat map displays correctly, initial setup is complete. Share the URL with employees and start using Hot Desking.
setup.completeText: Great job! Initial setup is complete.
setup.completeStep1Desc: Share the "General Hot Desking Screen" URL from admin menu with employees
setup.completeStep3Desc: When employees change or seats are modified, update and upload Excel using the same procedure
